mapper.select: select org_code orgCode,ipo_plate ipoPlate from ipo_case where id = #{id}

SELECT t1.id letter_id, t2.id question_id, t1.company_name, t2.text_content, t2.type, t2. LEVEL, t4. LEVEL, t4.letter_class_name question_type, t5.letter_class_name, CAST(t2.ask_no AS SIGNED) askNo, t8.text_content answer FROM sa_letter t1 LEFT JOIN label_xml_structure t2 ON t2.rela_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN letter_class t4 ON t4.tree_type != '1' AND FIND_IN_SET(t4.id, t2.question_type) LEFT JOIN letter_class t5 ON t5.id = t4.parent_id LEFT JOIN letter_class t6 ON t6.id = t1.letter_type LEFT JOIN label_ask_answer t7 ON t7.ask_id = t6.id LEFT JOIN label_xml_structure t8 ON t8.id = t7.answer_id WHERE t1.rela_code = #{orgCode} AND t2.type = 'l' AND t2.`level` = '4' AND t4. LEVEL != '0' AND t6.letter_class_name = 'IPO预披露反馈意见'
AND t4.id IN
#{item}
ORDER BY t1.letter_date,askNo
SELECT a.id answerId, b.text_content answerContent FROM label_xml_structure b, label_ask_answer a WHERE a.answer_id = b.id AND a.ask_id = #{questionId} limit 1;

SELECT t.id labelCode, t.letter_class_name labelName, count(*) labelCount FROM ( SELECT t5.id, t5.letter_class_name FROM sa_letter t1 LEFT JOIN label_xml_structure t2 ON t2.rela_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN letter_class t4 ON t4.tree_type != '1' AND FIND_IN_SET(t4.id, t2.question_type) LEFT JOIN letter_class t5 ON t5.id = t4.parent_id LEFT JOIN letter_class t6 ON t6.id = t1.letter_type WHERE t1.id = #{letterId} AND t2.type = 'l' AND t2.`level` = '4' AND t4. LEVEL != '0' AND t6.letter_class_name = 'IPO预披露反馈意见' GROUP BY t2.id, t5.id, t5.letter_class_name ) t GROUP BY t.id, t.letter_class_name ORDER BY id

SELECT '' labelCode, '全部' labelName, count(*) labelCount FROM ( SELECT t4.id, t4.letter_class_name, CAST(t2.ask_no AS SIGNED) askNo FROM sa_letter t1 LEFT JOIN label_xml_structure t2 ON t2.rela_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN letter_class t4 ON t4.tree_type != '1' AND FIND_IN_SET(t4.id, t2.question_type) LEFT JOIN letter_class t5 ON t5.id = t4.parent_id LEFT JOIN letter_class t6 ON t6.id = t1.letter_type WHERE t1.id = #{letterId} AND t5.id = #{parentId} AND t2.type = 'l' AND t2.`level` = 4 AND t4. LEVEL != '0' AND t6.letter_class_name = 'IPO预披露反馈意见' GROUP BY t2.id ) t UNION SELECT t.id labelCode, t.letter_class_name labelName, count(*) labelCount FROM ( SELECT t4.id, t4.letter_class_name, CAST(t2.ask_no AS SIGNED) askNo FROM sa_letter t1 LEFT JOIN label_xml_structure t2 ON t2.rela_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN letter_class t4 ON t4.tree_type != '1' AND FIND_IN_SET(t4.id, t2.question_type) LEFT JOIN letter_class t5 ON t5.id = t4.parent_id LEFT JOIN letter_class t6 ON t6.id = t1.letter_type WHERE t1.id = #{letterId} AND t5.id = #{parentId} AND t2.type = 'l' AND t2.`level` = 4 AND t4. LEVEL != '0' AND t6.letter_class_name = 'IPO预披露反馈意见' GROUP BY t2.id, t4.id, t4.letter_class_name ORDER BY askNo ) t GROUP BY t.id, t.letter_class_name
SELECT date_format(t1.process_time, '%Y-%m-%d') process_time FROM ipo_process t1 WHERE t1.bid = #{id} AND t1.process_type_code in ('05','32','45') AND t1.process_time IS NOT NULL

SELECT t1.id FROM sa_letter t1 LEFT JOIN letter_class t2 ON t2.id = t1.letter_type WHERE t2.letter_class_name = 'IPO预披露反馈意见' AND t1.rela_code = #{orgId} and t1.post_status = '1' and t1.letter_valid = '0'
and t1.letter_date in
#{item}
order by t1.letter_date
select id,letter_class_name,concat(t1.sort) sort from letter_class t1 where t1.`level` = 0 order by t1.sort
SELECT process_time FROM ipo_process t1 WHERE t1.bid = #{id} AND CONVERT(t1.process_type_code,SIGNED) > 10 and CONVERT(t1.process_type_code,SIGNED) < 31

SELECT t1.id FROM sa_letter t1 LEFT JOIN letter_class t2 ON t2.id = t1.letter_type WHERE t2.letter_class_name in ('科创板上市申请文件审核问询函','审核中心意见落实函') AND t1.rela_code = #{orgId} and t1.post_status = '1' and t1.letter_valid = '0'
and t1.letter_date in
#{item}
order by t1.letter_date
